Package edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model

Class SmallBus

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.Vehicle
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.Bus
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.SmallBus
All Implemented Interfaces:
VehicleObserver
public class SmallBus extends Bus
Represents a small bus in the simulation. A SmallBus operates on a specified route with a smaller capacity than regular buses, making it suitable for low-demand routes. This class extends the Bus class, inheriting its core functionality.
